reviews.review_msg: He has a terrible attitude. He is condescending and subtly mocks students. He makes the material harder than it is & he makes you purchase the online learning section of the textbook to do homework. I've never felt more uncomfortable by anyone as much as I've felt by him.

Prof that will go through problems with you step by step during lecture. If you do the assignments and go to lecture you should have no problem getting at least a B in this course. He tries to invoke more critical thinking then most profs, so if you are not a thinker, then maybe you should avoid him. Otherwise, pretty standard lecturer.
